Uses of Package
com.here.android.mpa.guidance

  • Packages that use com.here.android.mpa.guidance 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance
    The guidance package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations related to guidance and turn-by-turn navigation, used by other packages in the APIs for Android SDK.
  • Classes in com.here.android.mpa.guidance used by com.here.android.mpa.guidance 
    Class and Description
    LaneInfo 
    LaneInfo.Directions
    Defined values for all possible directions the lane leads.
    NavigationManager
    This class controls turn by turn navigation.
    NavigationManager.AspectRatio
    A measure of an image's aspect ratio which is w x h.
    NavigationManager.Error
    Navigation Manager Error
    NavigationManager.Listener 
    NavigationManager.MapUpdateMode
    Map Update Mode
    NavigationManager.NaturalGuidanceMode
    Enum used to turn on/off features within natural guidance.
    NavigationManager.NavigationMode
    Possible Navigation Modes
    NavigationManager.NavigationState
    Possible states of navigation
    NavigationManager.Orientation
    Used for setting the orientation of NavigationManager.NavigationMode.TRACKING.
    NavigationManager.RealisticViewMode
    Enum used to turn on/off realistic view (junction view and 2D signs).
    NavigationManager.TrafficAvoidanceMode
    Specifies if traffic should be automatically avoided or not during navigation
    NavigationManager.UnitSystem
    Supported unit system types
    TrafficNotification 
    TrafficNotificationInfo 
    TrafficNotificationInfo.Type
    Type for a traffic notification, with regards to the current route
    TrafficUpdater 
    TrafficUpdater.Error 
    TrafficUpdater.GetEventsListener 
    TrafficUpdater.Listener
    Interface to report traffic status changes.
    TrafficUpdater.RequestInfo
    Holds the error code and request id from a request for traffic.
    TrafficUpdater.RequestState
    Traffic status enumeration
    TrafficWarner 
    TrafficWarner.Listener
    A listener for traffic notifications which should be added to a traffic warner
    VoiceCatalog
    Manages the voice catalog used to download new voice skins.
    VoiceCatalog.Error
    Error codes for VoiceCatalog.OnDownloadDoneListener.
    VoiceCatalog.OnDownloadDoneListener
    Callback from report that the voice catalog/package download is done
    VoiceCatalog.OnProgressListener
    Callback to report the catalog/package download progress.
    VoicePackage
    Return information about downloaded voice packages.
    VoicePackage.Gender
    Gender for a VoicePackage.
    VoiceSkin
    Defines a voice skin used for guidance.
    VoiceSkin.OutputType
    Voice Skin Output Types
